IGCLApi Main IGCL API wrapper providing safe access to Intel Graphics Control Library IGCLApiHelper High-level IGCL entry point that owns the native API handle and exposes common helpers and feature factories. IGCLDisplayHelper Display helper facade for IGCL display handles. IGCLEccHelper ECC helper: properties and state management. IGCLEngineHelper Engine helper: enumerate engine groups and query properties/activity. IGCLException Exception thrown when an IGCL API call fails IGCLFanHelper Fan helper: enumerate fans, query properties, and set modes. IGCLFirmwareHelper Firmware helper: base and component firmware queries, PCIe link speed control. IGCLFrequencyHelper Frequency helper: enumerate domains, query properties/state, and set ranges. IGCLHardwareDetection Hardware detection utilities for Intel GPU presence IGCLLedHelper LED helper: enumerate LEDs and get/set state. IGCLMediaHelper Media helper: video processing capabilities and get/set. IGCLMemoryHelper Memory helper: enumerate memory modules and query properties/state/bandwidth. IGCLOverclockHelper Overclock helper: properties, offsets, limits, telemetry, and reset. IGCLPciHelper PCI helper: properties and current state. IGCLPowerHelper Power helper: enumerate power domains, properties, energy counters, limits. IGCLTemperatureHelper Temperature helper: enumerate sensors, properties, and current temperature. api/NVAPIWrapper.html.title: Namespace NVAPIWrapper | NVAPIWrapper
api/NVAPIWrapper.html.summary: Namespace NVAPIWrapper Classes NVAPI NVAPIApi Main NVAPI wrapper providing safe access to NVIDIA NVAPI through QueryInterface. NVAPIApiHelper Facade entry point for NVAPI helper objects. NVAPIDisplayHelper Facade helper for an NVIDIA display handle. NVAPIDisplayTvEnums TV-related enum values surfaced alongside the display helper. NVAPIDisplayTvEnums.Connector GPU connector values (native enum names preserved). NVAPIDisplayTvEnums.Format TV format values (native enum names preserved). NVAPIDrsHelper Facade helper for NVAPI Driver Settings (DRS). NVAPIEventHandleHelper Facade helper for an NVAPI event registration handle. NVAPIException Exception thrown when an NVAPI call fails. NVAPIInterfaceTable Managed copy of nvapi_interface_table for QueryInterface lookups. NVAPILogicalGpuHelper Facade helper for a logical GPU. NVAPIMosaicHelper Facade helper for Mosaic operations. NVAPIOpenGLHelper Facade helper for OpenGL-related NVAPI functions. NVAPIPhysicalGpuHelper Facade helper for a physical GPU. NVAPIQuadroGSyncHelper Facade helper for Quadro G-Sync (frame lock) devices. NVAPIUnAttachedDisplayHelper Facade helper for an NVIDIA unattached display handle. NVAPIVideoHelper Facade helper for video-related NVAPI functions (VIO + Stereo globals). NVAPIVioDeviceHelper Facade helper for a VIO device handle. Structs NVAPIAdaptiveSyncGetDataDto DTO for adaptive sync GET data. NVAPIAdaptiveSyncSetDataDto DTO for adaptive sync SET data. NVAPIChipSetInfoDto Chipset information DTO. NVAPICustomDisplayDto DTO for custom display. NVAPIDisplayColorDataDto DTO for display color data. NVAPIDisplayColorimetryDto DTO for display colorimetry. NVAPIDisplayConfigAdvancedTargetDto Managed representation of advanced target configuration. NVAPIDisplayConfigDto Snapshot of the display configuration returned by NVAPI. NVAPIDisplayConfigPathDto Managed representation of an NVAPI display path configuration. NVAPIDisplayConfigSourceModeDto Managed representation of NVAPI display source mode info. NVAPIDisplayConfigTargetDto Managed representation of a display target configuration. NVAPIDisplayDriverInfoDto Display driver information DTO. index.html.title: NVAPIWrapper API Docs | NVAPIWrapper
index.html.summary: NVAPIWrapper API Docs Welcome to the generated API reference for NVAPIWrapper, a C# facade over the NVIDIA NVAPI SDK. Use this site to explore the public classes, helpers, and DTOs that make up the wrapper. The goal of NVAPIWrapper project is to provide a lightweight, simpler way to access the NVIDIA NVAPI API, to read settings and make changes to the NVIDIA GPU settings on a PC. The NVAPIWrapper project provides Helper objects that provide a pointer-free, simple ergonomic API surface to make it easy to use, and it still exposes the native handles if you need to do something advanced. How to use Start at the API landing page: NVAPIWrapper API Reference. Navigate by feature: helpers like NVAPIDisplayHelper and NVAPIPhysicalGpuHelper list the available operations and event hooks. Facade helpers return DTOs. Where to Learn More Project overview & usage: See README.md at the repository root or the repo at https://github.com/terrymacdonald/NVAPIWrapper for quick-start examples and patterns. NVAPI SDK reference: The upstream NVAPI SDK official docs are at https://docs.nvidia.com/gameworks/content/gameworkslibrary/coresdk/nvapi/index.html. NVAPI SDK repository: The upstream NVAPI SDK repository is at https://github.com/NVIDIA/nvapi. Samples provided by NVIDIA are available at ..\nvapi\Samples. NVAPIWrapper Samples: Runnable samples demonstrating display, desktop, GPU, and event-listener flows are under Sample_Code/. Regenerating Docs Use ./refresh_nvapi_api_docs.ps1 from the repo root to rebuild the DocFX site and serve it locally on port 8000.
